1064760.name: Moonlight thief Original Sound Track
1064760.description:
这是“月光怪盗”的原声带。
它是一种MP3格式，由作曲家mayolazr和Karut组成的共20个声源组成。

专辑曲目:

1. Moonlight thief (1:08)
- Composed by mayolazr

2. As planned (2:21)
- Composed by mayolazr

3. Daily routine (0:36)
- Composed by mayolazr

4. Reasoning (0:52)
- Composed by mayolazr

5. In the Presence of Death (1:21)
- Composed by mayolazr

6. I pray for You (1:01)
- Composed by mayolazr

7. Sneak (2:17)
- Composed by mayolazr

8. Theater (1:57)
- Composed by mayolazr

9. Prison break (1:55)
- Composed by mayolazr

10. Mastermind appears (1:22)
- Composed by mayolazr

11. Mystery (2:17)
- Composed by mayolazr

12. A den of vice (1:01)
- Composed by mayolazr

13. MooN, Light, Fight (1:57)
- Composed by Karut

14. Ability test (2:19)
- Composed by mayolazr

15. Revenge (1:22)
- Composed by mayolazr

16. Disturbance (1:29)
- Composed by mayolazr

17. The protector of the claws (2:23)
- Composed by mayolazr

18. The talon (2:17)
- Composed by mayolazr

19. Cash Rules (0:51)
- Composed by mayolazr

20. Road beyond (3:48)
- Composed by mayolazr , Vocal by Ms. Valentine
1064760.supported_languages: 英语, 韩语, 简体中文, 日语
